publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-850 Ms Wendy Alexander: The Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Houses in Multiple Occupation) Order 2000-That the Social Inclusion, Housing and Voluntary Sector Committee recommends that the draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Houses in Multiple Occupation) Order 2000 be approved.
